content: *pattern is only available from web archive org* note link goes to a direct download from the web archive this pattern page is a part of the crochet for every room collection this one is in the teen room section color-me-crazy crochet materials bernat satin 100 g/3 5 oz main color mc 04013 mocha 6 balls contrast a 04605 sunset 2 balls contrast b 04732 maitai 1 ball size 5 5 mm u s i or 9 crochet hook stuffing
